text: The 76th World Science Fiction Convention (Worldcon), also known as Worldcon 76 in San Jose,http://www.wsfs.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/2016-WSFS- Minutes-Final.pdf> was held in San Jose, California from August 16 to 20, 2018. The guests of honor included authors Chelsea Quinn Yarbro and Spider Robinson; artist John Picacio; musician Frank Hayes; and fans Pierre and Sandy Pettinger. == Awards == The awards were announced at the convention. == References == Category:Worldcon Category:2018 conferences
title: 76th World Science Fiction Convention
